info.name: Hostel Management System - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Complete REST API collection with automated token management and test scripts

**Features:**
- All 55 API endpoints with sample requests
- Automated token extraction and environment variable management
- Pre-request scripts for authentication
- Test scripts for response validation
- Sample data for all endpoints

**Setup:**
1. Import this collection in Postman
2. Create environment with variables:
   - base_url: http://localhost:5000/api
   - student_token, admin_token, superadmin_token (auto-populated)
   - student_pnr, admin_id, hostel_id, room_id, application_id (auto-populated)

**Usage:**
- Run 'Create SuperAdmin' first to get superadmin access
- Use 'Register Student' or 'Register Admin' to create users
- Tokens are automatically saved after login/register
- Run collection with Collection Runner for automated testing

exec: // Global pre-request script for all requests
// Set base URL if not exists
// Global test script for all responses
